import React from 'react' import './DetailsPage.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Slider from '../../Slider/Slider' import Button2 from '../../SiteButtons/Button2/Button2' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { useState } from 'react' import styles from "../../SiteButtons/Button1/Button1.module.css" const ProductContext = React.createContext(); var userPhoto = require("../../../assets/user.png") const DetailsPage = (props) => { debugger let [size, setSize] = useState(); let [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(); let [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(); let [modalProduct, setProduct] = useState(false); const addToCart = (payload) => { const cardItems = props.items; const { price, photos, _id } = payload; const photo = photos.middle; var data = { photo, price, _id }; if (cardItems.length > 0) { cardItems.forEach(item => { if (item._id === payload._id) { item.quantity++; } else { props.addToCart(Object.assign({ size, startDate, endDate, quantity: 1 }, data)) } }); } else { props.addToCart(Object.assign({ size, startDate, endDate, quantity: 1 }, data)) } } const getSize = (event) => { setSize(event.target.value) } const getStartDate = (event) => { setStartDate(event.target.value) } const getEndDate = (event) => { setEndDate(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); } const getItem = id => { const product = props.cardItems.find(item => item._id === id) return product; } const openModal = id => { const product = getItem(id); setProduct(product, modalProduct = true) } const closeModal = () => { setProduct(null, modalProduct = false) } return (

Gorgeous Finders Keepers red ruffle midi dress - is guaranteed to turn heads at any occasion. Uber flattering fit with adjustable tie back and beautiful ruffle detail.

Remember all our outfits are available to rent from 4 to 16 days and you don't have to worry about the cleaning - we do that for you!

Click here to browse other Midi Dresses.

Renting with Hirestreet is easy Simply choose your outfit, select your rental period and checkout to reserve your item. Once you have received your outfit, wear & share your look as much as you like until your return date.
